task.title: Migrating the Style-to-tag Mapping
task.shortdesc: If you want to use the latest code of the Word2DITA transform, but you have an older style-to-tag map (pre-0.9.19RC12Feature30), then you must migrate the older map to the newer markup.

taskbody.context: In the latest Word2DITA code, there is an XSLT transform under the utils/ directory in the plugin. Apply it to your old style-to-tag map. In many cases the migrated file will work as is, in a few cases it may need a small amount of tweaking.

step.cmd: Write a transformation scenario with the following parameters:

choices.choice: Output file: the name of the new map file (should be .xml)

step.cmd: Store your new map file in the xsl directory of your plugin. For example, DITA-OT/plugins/my-word2dita/xsl/new-style2tagmap.xml
